ARABIC: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We are hastening to them with good things? No indeed, but they have no awareness!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We are hastening to reward them for good deeds? No. They do not comprehend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We are busy lavishing on them all kinds of good? Nay, they do not perceive the reality of the matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We provide them with the means of competing with each other in virtuous deeds, but they do not realize this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Are quickly giving them goodness? In fact, they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We hasten unto them with good things. Nay, but they perceive not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We are hastening to them of good things? Nay, they do not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We vie in good works for them? Nay, but they are not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We hasten unto them with good things? Nay, but they perceive not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: have no other purpose except to help them in acquiring material benefits? No indeed. But they do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We are hastening them on to good things? Aye! they perceive not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We are eager to bring them good? No, they are not aware!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We would hasten them on in every good? Nay, they do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We hasten unto them with good things (in this worldly life so that they will have no share of good things in the Hereafter)? Nay, but they perceive not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We hasten in good works for them? No, they are not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We race to give them the good things? In fact, they have no idea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:56] We are hastening to [provide] them with good things? No. Rather, they are not aware, that this is a way of gradually drawing them [into their punishment].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We hasten unto them with good things) in this world; and it is said: in the Hereafter? (Nay, but they perceive not) that We provide them in the life of this world but will humiliate them in the Hereafter.
